title: The Greatest Squirt Gun Ever Built
dc:creator: WBUR
description: One of the bestselling toys of all-time, the Super Soaker, was invented by a rocket scientist nicknamed "The Professor." This is the story of the man, the legend: Lonnie Johnson.

itunes:subtitle: One of the bestselling toys of all-time, the Super Soaker, was invented by a rocket scientist nicknamed "The Professor." This is the story of the man, the legend: Lonnie Johnson.

media:content.media:description: Toy inventor Lonnie Johnson poses with his creation "The Super Soaker" outside his Marietta, Ga., office  Nov. 12, 1998.  Johnson, who once worked for NASA, hit on his idea for the high-powered water gun while trying to invent a heat pump that would use water instead of Freon.  (John Bazemore/AP)

content:encoded: One of the bestselling toys of all-time, the Super Soaker, was invented by a rocket scientist nicknamed "The Professor." This is the story of the man, the legend: Lonnie Johnson.
